name: Crumpy Motorcycle Race
description:
I worked on this game in my Game Dev I course. I was the sole programmer, and the music, art, and story were handled by my teammates. This game is based on the events of the 2002 Speedway World Cup, though its narrative adds a quite a few exaggerations and details here and there. You play as Jason Crump and your goal is to win the world cup and uncover the truth behind your father's death. 

The project is a little large so make sure you zoom out when viewing it. Clicking anywhere on the screen will progress dialogue.  When racing, you can move using the arrow keys or be clicking on the sides of the screen.

This game was made with Phaser.
